title: Vows of a Mobster
description: The truth is never what it seems. Neither are the people, regardless of who they are.✅ Mafia romance ✅ Age Gap✅ Murder mystery✅ Steamy sex✅ ViolenceI knew the past would come back to haunt me. It was only a matter of time before my world came crashing down.The only thing I didn’t expect was Mateo. The head of the Italian mafia. We were never meant to cross paths; our worlds vastly different.His green gaze captured me, his touch burning through my defenses. The words he whispered melted away all the years of loneliness. But the secret I kept could get me killed. If he spared me, his rivals wouldn’t. As my secrets unravel, it could cost me everything and everyone I loved.
author: Eva Winners
